backend/main.mo: Defines the main backend actor with storage mixins, access control, book/catalog types, KYC structures, message handling state, and an admin‑restricted exportCatalog function.
feature_evidence.json: Provides feature evidence entries listing related files, components, and test IDs for publishing Version 29 and performing the Version 29 live smoke test.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten short summaries for numerous frontend source files describing their roles in routing, UI components, pages, and media rendering.
frontend/.env.production: Sets VITE_APP_ENV=Live for production builds to ensure the Live environment badge.
frontend/docs/deployment-preflight.md: Explains preflight validation required before publishing Version 29, including version lock, environment checks, dependency verification, and production build validation.
frontend/docs/draft-rebuild-v29.md: Describes procedures and safety rules for rebuilding Draft Version 29 without affecting the Live site or backend canister.
frontend/docs/live-smoke-test-v22.md: Provides manual verification steps for Live Smoke Test Version 22, covering environment badge, catalog, media, and purchase flow checks.
frontend/docs/live-smoke-test-v29-report: Template for documenting results of the Version 29 Live smoke test, including checklist sections for environment, catalog, purchase flow, and library verification.
frontend/docs/live-smoke-test-v29.md: Manual smoke test checklist for verifying Version 29 on the Live site, covering environment badge, version label, catalog, book details, and other UI checks.
frontend/docs/publish-live.md: Instructions for publishing Version 29 to the Live frontend, enforcing version lock and detailing what the deployment does and does not modify.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme CSS variables and base styles for the frontend.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that loads the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/scripts/deployment-preflight.sh: Preflight script validating environment, version lock, dependencies, and build readiness for a frontend-only Version 29 Live deployment.
frontend/scripts/enforce-version-29.sh: Guard script ensuring the VERSION file contains exactly 29, blocking any non‑29 deployment.
frontend/scripts/live-smoke-test-v22-hel: Helper script printing key URLs and the manual smoke test checklist for Version 22.
frontend/scripts/live-smoke-test-v29-hel: Helper script printing key URLs and the manual smoke test checklist for Version 29.
frontend/scripts/publish-live.sh: Deploys only the Version 29 frontend to the live environment after enforcing version checks and running preflight validations.
frontend/scripts/rebuild-draft-v29.sh: Rebuilds the frontend in Draft mode for Version 29, regenerating bindings and producing a fresh local Draft build without publishing.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the app's route structure using TanStack Router and wraps the UI with theme and toast providers.
frontend/src/components/admin/BookMediaM: Provides upload and removal handling for a book’s PDF, images, audio, and video files with progress tracking and validation.
Protects admin-only pages by checking authentication and admin status, showing appropriate loading or error states.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Button that manages Internet Identity login/logout flow with status handling and error recovery.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Prompts newly authenticated users to enter a name and saves their profile if none exists.
frontend/src/components/books/BookCard.t: Displays a book card with cover, title, pricing badges, availability states, and link to details.
frontend/src/components/books/CoverImage: Renders a book cover using an uploaded image or fallback placeholders with error handling.
frontend/src/components/checkout/KycVeri: Handles KYC document submission, validation, and verification state during checkout.
frontend/src/components/checkout/SelfieC: Placeholder component with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: Reusable component for showing a centered empty-state message with optional icon, description, and action.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Shows contact links, attribution, version info, and a customer service chat entry.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Renders the main navigation bar with auth state, cart count, balance, and environment badge.
frontend/src/components/layout/Layout.ts: Defines the overall page layout with header, footer, and routed content outlet.
frontend/src/components/layout/PageLayou: Wraps page content with configurable max‑width and padding.
frontend/src/components/library/BookCont: Dialog for viewing and downloading purchased book content and media with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/library/LibraryP: Provides a button to download a purchased book’s PDF with permission checks and error messaging.
frontend/src/components/support/Customer: Customer support chat dialog allowing users to submit messages and view threaded responses using support chat hooks.
frontend/src/config/environment.ts: Normalizes Vite env variables to Draft or Live and exports the resolved environment.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on user identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminRecovery.ts: Provides a mutation to trigger admin access recovery with mapped error messages and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Hooks for fetching and updating user profiles and checking admin status using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useBalance.ts: Hooks for retrieving user token balance and minting tokens with automatic cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useBooks.ts: Hooks for fetching, adding, updating, and uploading content for books, with cache invalidations on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Hooks for managing cart items, checkout flow, and computing cart totals with linked book data.
frontend/src/hooks/useCatalogTransfer.ts: Exports and imports full catalog state and invalidates related caches after import.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handles login state, and exposes identity, login, and logout operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useKyc.ts: Provides a mutation hook to submit document-based KYC and invalidate the cart on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useLibrary.ts: Builds the user's library from their orders and books and provides hooks to fetch purchased content or media.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Exposes hooks for fetching a single order, the user's orders, or all orders through the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useResetStore.ts: Defines a mutation to reset the backend store and invalidates all related queries, with permission-aware error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useSupportChat.ts: Implements hooks for sending support messages, fetching user or admin messages, and replying as an admin.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables for light and dark modes with a bookstore color palette.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function for merging class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider and mounts it to the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCatalogPag: Provides admin interfaces to view, add, edit, delete, and manage book metadata and media.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Hosts the admin dashboard with tabs for catalog, orders, minting, support, and settings.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminMintPage.t: Provides a form for admins to mint GLDT tokens by entering a recipient principal and amount, handling validation and success/error feedback.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Displays all customer orders in a table with order details, item titles, totals, and timestamps using fetched order and book data.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminRecoveryPa: Allows admins to recover access by signing in with Internet Identity and running a recovery mutation, showing success or error states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSettingsPa: Offers admin tools for resetting the store, exporting the catalog, importing catalog files with merge/overwrite modes, and handling file parsing and confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSupportInb: Shows threaded customer support messages, lets admins view conversations, and send replies through a response mutation.
frontend/src/pages/BookDetailsPage.tsx: Displays detailed information for a book, handles add-to-cart actions, and manages sold-out and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Shows the user's cart with item management, single-copy validation, and checkout handling.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Renders the book catalog with search filtering and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Implements the checkout flow with balance checks, KYC verification, cart validation, and order submission.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the homepage with a hero section and a featured books list pulled from available books.
frontend/src/pages/MyLibraryPage.tsx: Shows the user’s purchased books and allows reading or downloading associated media.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Loads and displays details of a completed order, including items and total paid.
frontend/src/pages/PurchaseConfirmationP: Shows a purchase success message with actions to view the library, order details, or continue shopping.
frontend/src/utils/catalogTransfer.ts: Validates, parses, and merges catalog JSON data, supporting overwrite and merge modes for catalog import operations.
frontend/src/utils/download.ts: Provides helpers to download raw data, URLs, or JSON files by generating blobs and triggering browser downloads.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Contains formatting utilities for token amounts, principals, and timestamps, plus parsing for token amounts.
frontend/src/utils/kyc.ts: Generates stable KYC identifiers and validates document numbers with basic checks.
Provides functions to detect KYC-related purchase restriction errors and map them to a user-friendly message.
frontend/src/utils/orderId.ts: Generates a unique order ID using a timestamp and random number.
frontend/src/utils/principal.ts: Parses a principal string into a Principal object and throws an error for invalid formats.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting both query and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, version state, notes, and existing feature records for build management.
